column2:
"Perfect.
That was a flawless result.
You've passed this task."

"...you are the first student I've had
to show me such growth.
In the end, you've really urged me on."

"You should be able to reach even
higher heights. I hope you'll continue
your training in the future."

"Now my wand training
is complete for the moment.
Anyways, see you again."
